descriptionSet.description: A collage with several labels with the following written or depicted content: (From top left) 1. Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay. 2. A sketch of a government building and a busy road in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay 3. A deer in a label of Geigy 4.An industrial complex in a label of Geigy; (second row from left) 5. A genleman sitting on a chair in a room, in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany) 6. Two tusks in a label of Indian Chemical Industries (India) Ltd. 7. Two peacocks in a label of Geigy 8. A sketch of a government building and a busy road in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; (third row from left) 9. A deer in a label of Geigy 10. Sugarcane seller in a label of Indian Chemical Industries (India) Ltd. 11. Fire, in a label of Rohner Ltd. Chemical Works, Pratteln, made in Switzerland 12. A chariot in motion, in a label of Rohner Ltd. Chemical Works, Pratteln, made in Switzerland; (fourth row from left) 13. A monument with a dome, in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. (made in Germany) 14. Indigo-workers are at work, in a label of Imperial Chemical Industries (India) Ltd. 15. A red emblem, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay 16. A green creature, in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany) 17. Baby Krishna is tied to some object, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay.

inscription.text: DADAJEE DHACKJEE & CO. LTD. VUDGADI, BOMBAY. FARBENFABRIKEN BAYER, LEVERKUSEN
DD (brand logo) Geigy (brand logo) ICI (brand logo) R (brand logo)
IMPERIAL CHEMICAL INDUSTRIES TWO TUSKS (upside down)

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art"
511###Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
